name: Coup 2776
description:
GET IT FOR ANDROID VIA GOOGLE PLAY!

Charlottesville, P.E.I. - 2776

The incredible mad scientist Dr. Barnibus has defied the laws of nature and cybernetically-enhanced a carrier pidgeon to deliver his mail. 

But the watchful eye of TwitNet, a social-network mogul is ever present; our beloved hero must weave its way through hordes of evil minions in its quest to deliver sensitive parcels in an endless mission to preserve Dr. Barnibus' privacy. 

------------------------------------------

Initially developed in 1.5 days for GGJ2018

Concept and Visuals by Vulture Boy  &  Veronica

Programming and Cutscenes by Vulture Boy

Sound by Feyla, Intro Level Design by Lukas
